scenario: There are errors in the actual scenario. Remember that each rule needs at least 1 element as trigger.
noCloseRules: There are no closing rules or they are all disabled
noOpenRules: There are no opening rules or they are all disabled
noElements: This rule does not have any elements.
noTrigger: This rule does not have any elements in trigger mode
maxTrigger: There can only be one item in trigger mode
